Package swd.team11.coviddatabase.server.network

Class RequestHandler

java.lang.Object
swd.team11.coviddatabase.server.network.RequestHandler
public class RequestHandler extends Object
Class for handling requests packets received from clients

    addAccount(UserAccount userAccount, ArgsParser args)

    Check if account exists, if it does, send data Packet of success back to Client and continue waiting to receive account data so you can create account, if not send detailed ERROR message packet to user.

  • Method Details

    • processRequest

      public void processRequest()
      Reads request data identifier, ensures valid request packet and determines what data the client wants back then runs the necessary methods to obtain it.

    • getVaccinationInfo

      public void getVaccinationInfo(ArgsParser args)

    • getGuidelines

      public void getGuidelines(ArgsParser args)

    • createAccount

      public void createAccount(ArgsParser args)
      Check if account exists, if it does, send data Packet of success back to Client and continue waiting to receive account data so you can create account, if not send detailed ERROR message packet to user.
      Parameters:
      args - Arguments passed in request message

    • addAccount

      public void addAccount(UserAccount userAccount, ArgsParser args)
      Attempt to add account to user_accounts database, if the account already exists or other part false it will send a error packet back, otherwise it will send a success packet. Client must send request to make account, then method will listen for packet containing user account data and try to add it to the MySQL table.
      Parameters:
      userAccount - User account to create in database
      args - Args passed in original request message

    • searchUserAccount

      public void searchUserAccount(String username, String password)
      Search to see if a user account exists, if it does send this account packet back to the client that requested it. This is used to handle login requests sent by the client.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the account
      password - Associated account password
